attributes.action: Remove the Church of England's Bishops from the House of Lords
attributes.background: Currently there are 26 Bishops from the Church of England in the House of Lords. They should be removed, there should be a clear separation between the Church and the State. We shouldn't give individuals political power based on their religious status.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Remove the automatic right of bishops to sit in the House of Lords
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700563
